channel.title: Change animations?
channel.description: i have a few questions about the animatiosn, is it possible to remove the animations for some npc's so they won't twitch? and ow can i changethe nimation for the lvl fireworks? my friend did it on his server and it looks just aswome, but he didn't want to tell me -.-

item.title: Change animations?
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

npc.java, not in your config folder either youll see it

Read full topic

item.title: Change animations?
item.dc:creator: @fafaerer fafaerer
item.description:
@fafaerer wrote:

yes, but you don’t remove them… just change them because some animations, such as zombie, are trying to use human animations, and also for their deaths… just search for a list of animations and you should find them for each npc. Also, just find the emote for the fireworks, in the list you should find, and change it to whatever you’d like.

Read full topic

item.title: Change animations?
